channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: KPMG’s new CEO joined as an intern 33 years ago. Now he wants to lure Gen Z back with a new office outfitted with moody lounges and a barista bar
item.description: KPMG is shrinking its New York footprint by 40% and betting on design—not mandates—to bring employees back to the office.

item.title: Waymo Gets Safety Audit, What About The Others?
item.description: Waymo seems wiling to let outsiders look at their practices and data. Where are Tesla at the others in having this important transparency? Also, what ...

item.title: Here Is The 2025 Game Of The Year ‘Shortlist’ Of 11 Games
item.description: Game of the Year awards are coming up at The Game Awards, and only six games can make it in a massive year of releases. Here are the frontrunners.

item.title: Corporate America is trying to tell us something about the economy, top analyst says: a 3-year recession for ‘much of the private economy’ ended in April
item.description: Morgan Stanley's Mike Wilson was a lonely voice on Wall Street calling a "rolling recession" when others saw a boom. Now he sees a "rolling recovery."

item.title: OpenAI’s new safety tools are designed to make AI models harder to jailbreak. Instead, they may give users a false sense of security.
item.description: OpenAI has open-sourced two AI safety classifiers that let enterprises more easily set their own guardrails. Experts say the move could improve transp...

item.title: Did Western Digital And Seagate Ship Fewer HDDs Last Quarter?
item.description: WDC and Seagate limited investor information on total HDD and particularly nearline units shipped as well as information on ASPs for CQ2 25. Do invest...

item.title: Supreme Court weighs Trump administration's tariff authority under emergency powers law
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear a major tariff case that could impact the $88 billion in revenue collected by the Trump administration under IEEPA, which ...

item.title: Nano Banana: Google's AI Photo Tool Expands To Google Messages
item.description: Google Messages is gets a Nano Banana-shaped AI upgrade

item.title: A DCU Star Just Got Cast In ‘One Piece’ Season 3 Ahead Of Season 2
item.description: Despite One Piece season 2 still over four months away, One Piece season 3 is already racking up cast members, and has pulled one from the DCU.

item.title: Palantir says college is no longer a reliable training ground—so it hired 22 high school students instead: ‘Skip the debt. Skip the indoctrination.’
item.description: 22 Gen Zers are currently graduating from Palantir’s Meritocracy Fellowship, as CEO Alex Karp calls his company "the best credential in tech."

item.title: Meet Mira Nair, Zohran Mamdani’s 68-year-old mother who hit it big in Hollywood directing critical darlings like ‘Monsoon Wedding’
item.description: Nair is the first woman director to win the Venice Film Festival's top prize, and famously turned down WB's offer to direct the fourth Harry Potter mo...

item.title: Private sector added better-than-expected 42,000 jobs in October, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Thursday is above economists’ estimates of an increase of 28,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a lo...

item.title: What's at stake for markets in the Supreme Court's Trump-tariffs case

item.title: Bessent says US housing market in 'recession' due to Federal Reserve interest rate policies

item.title: Fed president explains vote against interest rate cut
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25-basis-points in October, though two policymakers dissented from the move, with one saying that he remains...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
